vlive.korean: 저의 초대 손님입니다! These are my invited guests. 듣기 View video ITZY : 🖤
[파티당일] 초대장 가지고 오셨어요? [The day of party] Did you bring your invitation? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 주의) 너무 눈 부셔서 선글라스 끼고 봐야하는 영상 [엑스엑스(XX)] - 발렌타인데이 특집
vlive.english: [The day of party] Did you bring your invitation?

vlive.korean: 긴 말 안 하고 초대해 보겠습니다 들어와주세요! Without further ado, let's invite him. Come in! 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 연준 : 게임의 정석
vlive.english: Without further ado, let's invite him. Come in!

vlive.korean: 이제 태태 FM은 이제 게스트들을 초대를... - 나 화장실 좀 써도 되냐? TaeTae FM invites guests... - Can I use your bathroom? 듣기 View video BTS : 태태 FM 6.13 🐯
vlive.english: TaeTae FM invites guests... - Can I use your bathroom?

vlive.korean: 저를 초대를 해줘야... I need to be invited... 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 안녕하쇠영

examples.korean: They only invited Jack and Sarah as an afterthought. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 나중에 생각이 나서 잭과 사라를 초대했을 뿐이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They only invited Jack and Sarah as an afterthought. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He turned up uninvited. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 초대도 받지 않고 나타났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He turned up uninvited. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She had already compromised herself by accepting his invitation. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 이미 그의 초대를 받아들임으로써 자신을 위태롭게 만든 상태였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She had already compromised herself by accepting his invitation. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We’re invited for 7.30. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 7시 30분에 초대받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We’re invited for 7.30. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I was gratified by their invitation. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 그들의 초대에 기뻤다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I was gratified by their invitation. Add to Wordbook
